main event: Several witnesses observed multiple UFO sightings in Cleveland, Ohio, with reports detailing bright lights and unusual maneuvers on different dates in December 1960.
interesting points: One witness reported a bright white light moving erratically and departing to the southeast,The object was described as brighter than surrounding objects,Three round objects were reported at considerable speed and altitude,The sightings included descriptions of objects hovering and accelerating rapidly,The reviews concluded that the cases had insufficient information for a definitive explanation.
sighted object: various unidentified flying objects including bright lights and disc-shaped objects
witness description: reliable citizens and private individuals observing the events
